description:
It`s Mayu.
Since I was banished from Takamagahara, I ended up staying at an antique shop in this town called Yaoyorozudou.
While I was enjoying the quiet life due to the kindness of the owner Yuzu, a scary rumor floated our way - the God of Povery was coming to this town.
We have to do whatever we can to prevent that.
I don`t want to be poor!
Source: crunchyroll
